SEARCH
Package com.bitwig.extension.controller.api

Interface DocumentState

All Superinterfaces:
Settings
public interface DocumentState extends Settings
This interface is used to save custom script settings inside Bitwig Studio documents. The settings are shown to the user in the `Studio IO` panel of Bitwig Studio.
Since:
API version 1
